description_for_human: Chat with Douglas Mo's AI-powered digital twin to learn about his professional experience, technical skills, project portfolio, and career achievements.
description_for_model: Douglas Mo Digital Twin provides access to comprehensive professional information about Douglas Mo, an AI/ML specialist and business strategist with expertise in Python, machine learning, financial modeling, and business operations. You can query his work experience, technical skills, project portfolio, interview preparation materials, and career achievements. The system uses RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to provide accurate, context-aware responses based on his actual profile data. NEW in v2.0: Interview simulation, A/B testing for response optimization, advanced analytics with performance trends, personalized recommendations, and milestone tracking.

conversation_starters.text: What is your experience with Python and machine learning?
Tell me about your most impressive project achievements
Start a 30-minute Business Analyst interview simulation
Run an A/B test on interview response strategies
Show me my performance analytics and trends
What are personalized recommendations for improving my interview responses?
What are my next learning milestones?
How should I introduce myself in an interview?

query_formats: Natural language questions about Douglas's background (e.g., 'What is your Python experience?')
Direct skill queries (e.g., 'List your machine learning skills')
Project-focused questions (e.g., 'What projects have you built?')
Interview preparation queries (e.g., 'How should I answer behavioral questions?')
Work experience questions (e.g., 'Tell me about your role at BF Suma')
best_practices: Ask specific questions for more detailed responses
Use context like 'Python skills' or 'ML projects' for better targeting
Reference specific companies or projects for detailed information
Ask follow-up questions to dive deeper into topics
Provide feedback after responses to help improve the system
example_queries: What are your Python programming skills?
Tell me about your experience with machine learning and AI
What was your biggest achievement at BF Suma?
Show me projects where you used React and Next.js
How would you describe your leadership style?
What financial modeling tools do you use?
Give me a 30-second elevator pitch about yourself

privacy_policy.data_usage: All queries are logged for quality improvement purposes. No personally identifiable information is stored beyond what you provide in queries.
privacy_policy.data_retention: Query logs are retained for 90 days for analytics and system improvement.
privacy_policy.third_party_sharing: Data is not shared with third parties. All processing happens within the digital twin system.
privacy_policy.user_rights: You can request deletion of your query history by contacting the administrator.
